bug.author: FeelyChau
bug.description:
There are some bugs in 1.1.0, we need to fix them ASAP:
migration script error. #450 #440 pipcook-plugin-tensorflow-image-classification-evaluator type error. pipcook-plugin-detectron-model-train empty dict error Memory leak when run pipeline from ./example/pipelines/databinding-image-classification.json @rickycao-qy Command option --tuna missing #453 generate output after job status updated #454
